downloadTitle: eCommerce Connector in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the eCommerce Connector (EDI) module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.
detailsSection:
Audience This training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the eCommerce Connector (EDI) module in Microsoft Dynamics SL.​At Training Material Completion After reviewing this training, individuals will have:
  • A solid understanding of the EDI module including setup, maintenance, and processing.
  • An understanding of the interactions between the EDI module and the other Microsoft Dynamics SL modules.
  • The necessary preparation to continue on to the Advanced Shipment Management module.
Prerequisites Before reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • General knowledge of Microsoft Windows.
  • Knowledge of basic navigation functions in Microsoft Dynamics SL.
  • Order Management training course.
